s.text: Bills are in the works in both houses of Congress to outlaw human cloning--a step urged on all governments by the pope himself.
Bills are in the works in both houses of Congress to outlaw human cloning--a step urged on all governments by the pope himself.
Why mess with success?

Cloning is less personal than cuckoldry, but it strikes a similar chord: Someone has got the reproductive edge on you.

Despite how many or how few individual characteristics twins--or other clones--have in common, they are different people in the most fundamental sense . They have their own identities, their own thoughts, and their own rights.
The vast majority of people, including those who rail against science, owe their very lives to previous medical discoveries.

One recurring image in anti-cloning propaganda is of some evil dictator raising an army of cloned warriors.
It's an easy way to show sound-bite leadership on an issue that everybody is talking about, without much risk of bitter consequences.
